exercises.name: dumbbell bench press
instructions: Step:1 Lie flat on a bench with your feet flat on the ground and your back pressed against the bench.
Step:2 Hold a dumbbell in each hand, with your palms facing forward and your arms extended above your chest.
Step:3 Lower the dumbbells slowly to the sides of your chest, keeping your elbows at a 90-degree angle.
Step:4 Pause for a moment, then push the dumbbells back up to the starting position, fully extending your arms.
Step:5 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions.

exercises.name: dumbbell bent over row
instructions: Step:1 Stand with your feet shoulder-width apart, knees slightly bent, and hold a dumbbell in each hand with your palms facing your body.
Step:2 Bend forward at the hips, keeping your back straight and your core engaged.
Step:3 Let your arms hang straight down towards the floor, with your elbows slightly bent.
Step:4 Pull the dumbbells up towards your chest, squeezing your shoulder blades together.
Step:5 Pause for a moment at the top, then slowly lower the dumbbells back down to the starting position.
Step:6 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions.

exercises.name: dumbbell seated lateral raise
instructions: Step:1 Sit on a bench with your feet flat on the ground and a dumbbell in each hand, resting on your thighs.
Step:2 Keep your back straight and core engaged.
Step:3 Raise the dumbbells to your sides with a slight bend in your elbows, until your arms are parallel to the ground.
Step:4 Pause for a moment at the top, then slowly lower the dumbbells back down to the starting position.
Step:5 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions.

exercises.name: dumbbell standing triceps extension
instructions: Step:1 Stand with your feet shoulder-width apart and hold a dumbbell in one hand.
Step:2 Raise the dumbbell overhead, keeping your arm straight.
Step:3 Bend your elbow and lower the dumbbell behind your head, keeping your upper arm stationary.
Step:4 Extend your arm back up to the starting position.
Step:5 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions.

exercises.name: dumbbell seated bicep curl
instructions: Step:1 Sit on a bench with your feet flat on the ground and hold a dumbbell in each hand, palms facing up.
Step:2 Keep your back straight and your elbows close to your torso.
Step:3 Exhale and curl the dumbbells up towards your shoulders, contracting your biceps.
Step:4 Pause for a moment at the top, then inhale and slowly lower the dumbbells back down to the starting position.
Step:5 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions.

exercises.name: dumbbell over bench wrist curl
instructions: Step:1 Sit on a bench with your forearms resting on the bench and your palms facing up, holding a dumbbell in each hand.
Step:2 Allow your wrists to hang over the edge of the bench.
Step:3 Slowly curl your wrists upward, squeezing your forearms at the top of the movement.
Step:4 Pause for a moment, then slowly lower your wrists back down to the starting position.
Step:5 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions.

exercises.name: spell caster
instructions: Step:1 Stand with your feet shoulder-width apart and hold a dumbbell in one hand.
Step:2 Bend your knees slightly and hinge forward at the waist, keeping your back straight.
Step:3 Extend your arm with the dumbbell towards the opposite foot, rotating your torso as you do so.
Step:4 Return to the starting position and repeat on the other side.
Step:5 Continue alternating sides for the desired number of repetitions.

exercises.name: dumbbell goblet squat
instructions: Step:1 Stand with your feet shoulder-width apart, holding a dumbbell vertically against your chest with both hands.
Step:2 Keeping your chest up and core engaged, lower your body down into a squat position by pushing your hips back and bending your knees.
Step:3 Continue lowering until your thighs are parallel to the ground, or as low as you can comfortably go.
Step:4 Pause for a moment at the bottom, then push through your heels to return to the starting position.
Step:5 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions.

exercises.name: dumbbell lying femoral
instructions: Step:1 Lie flat on your back with your legs extended and a dumbbell resting on your lower abdomen.
Step:2 Bend your knees and bring the dumbbell towards your glutes, keeping your feet flat on the ground.
Step:3 Pause for a moment at the top, then slowly lower the dumbbell back to the starting position.
Step:4 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions.

exercises.name: dumbbell sumo pull through
instructions: Step:1 Stand with your feet wider than shoulder-width apart, toes pointed outwards.
Step:2 Hold a dumbbell with both hands in front of your body, arms extended.
Step:3 Bend your knees and lower your hips down into a squat position, keeping your back straight.
Step:4 Lower the dumbbell down between your legs, keeping your arms straight.
Step:5 Drive through your heels and extend your hips forward, pulling the dumbbell up and in front of your body.
Step:6 Squeeze your glutes at the top of the movement, then lower the dumbbell back down between your legs.
Step:7 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions.

exercises.name: dumbbell standing calf raise
instructions: Step:1 Stand with your feet shoulder-width apart, holding a dumbbell in each hand.
Step:2 Raise your heels off the ground as high as possible, using your calves.
Step:3 Pause for a moment at the top, then slowly lower your heels back down to the starting position.
Step:4 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions.
